dcterms:description: The T-REx dataset consists of relationship triplets consisting of pairs of entities and their relationships, e.g., (France, Paris, Capital of) and (Tsar Peter I, Moscow, Born in). It is used for generating questions based on these relationships.
dcterms:title: T-REx

dcterms:creator: Mandar Joshi
Eunsol Choi
Daniel Weld
Luke Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: TriviaQA is a reading comprehension dataset consisting of a set of 650,000 trivia question, answer, and evidence tuples. It is used in a closed book setting where models are only provided with questions.
dcterms:title: TriviaQA
